channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Address to a Joint Session of Congress: Live Updates
item.description: Follow along for live updates and analysis on Trump’s address to Congress.

item.title: Democrats slam Trump’s ‘unprecedented giveaway to his billionaire friends’ in response to president’s Congress speech

item.title: Trump calls out federal workers not showing up to the office, says it's time to drain 'the swamp'
item.description: President Donald Trump said it was time to drain the swamp, as he addressed the hundreds of thousands of federal workers who do not show up to work.

item.title: Trump’s Early Success at the Border Exposes Biden Lies
item.description: It turns out that slashing illegal crossings didn’t require an act of Congress but a president willing to enforce the law.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren Claps In Support Of Continuing Ukraine War For Five Years
item.description: The president pointed out Warren's support for the war with his long-time nickname referencing the senator's fake Indian identity.

item.title: Trump breaks record for length of address to Congress
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday broke the record for the longest address to a joint session of Congress.

item.title: Trump’s Victory Lap
item.description: The new president has a lot to boast about, but his fiscal and economic promises could set him up for failure.

item.title: The ring of truth
item.description: Also: Carlyle and Blackstone execs on tariffs, Target and Best Buy warn of price increases, Wall Street is distraught.

item.title: Trump’s EPA Is Giving Us a Cleaner Environment and Increased Prosperity
item.description: We are demonstrating that environmental protection and economic growth are complementary.

item.title: Federal Appeals Court Lets Schools Deceive Parents About Child Gender Transitions
item.description: A decision allowing schools to hide social gender transitioning of middle schoolers from parents is shot through with fallacies.

item.title: Shutting Down The Department Of Education: Linda McMahon Lays Out The ‘Final Mission’
item.description: McMahon is officially setting in motion the end of the agency, after it has already cut many of its left-wing prorams.

item.title: In party's response, Democratic Sen. Slotkin says Trump's tariffs will exacerbate economic woes
item.description: Sen. Elissa Slotkin warned that President Trump could usher the U.S. economy into a recession with his tariffs and other fiscal policies.

item.title: Democrats Protest Trump’s Agenda Because It Forces Them To Celebrate America’s Wins
item.description: Democrats’ rebuff of Trump’s invitation to unify over the betterment of the nation is a manifestation of hatred for their own country.

item.title: Trump announces White House shipbuilding office
item.description: President Trump announced a new White House office to revive the U.S. shipbuilding industry.

item.title: GOP rebels head to White House for meeting to avoid government shutdown
item.description: A group of House GOP rebels is heading to the White House Wednesday to discuss government funding ahead of the partial shutdown deadline.
